import React, { useState } from "react"; import classNames from "../utils/class-names"; import useInterval from "../utils/useInterval"; import ActiveDisplay from "./ActiveDisplay"; function Pomodoro() { // Timer starts out paused const [isTimerRunning, setIsTimerRunning] = useState(false); const [timeModeMaster, setTimeModeMaster] = useState({ focusCurrent: 25, focusMin: 5, focusMax: 60, focusIncrement: 5, // focusCount: 25*60, breakCurrent: 5, breakMin: 1, breakMax: 15, breakIncrement: 1, // breakCount: 5*60, mode: 'Focus', isRunning: false }); useInterval( () => { // ToDo: Implement what should happen when the timer is running }, isTimerRunning ? 1000 : null ); function playPause() { setIsTimerRunning((prevState) => !prevState); } return (
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current focus session duration */} Focus Duration: 25:00 {/* Set */}
{/* TODO: Implement decreasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */} {/* TODO: Implement increasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */}
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current break session duration */} Break Duration: 05:00
{/* TODO: Implement decreasing break duration and disable during a focus or break session*/} {/* TODO: Implement increasing break duration and disable during a focus or break session*/}
{/* TODO: Implement stopping the current focus or break session and disable when there is no active session */}
); } export default Pomodoro;
